structure.unit: LEVEES, DRAINAGE, AND RECLAMATION OF LANDS

law.text: The fiscal court of any county may, when in its judgment the public interests and welfare justify it, make appropriations to aid any drainage district of the county in making or maintaining any improvement.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 2380-24.
